Subject: Making Games for Free
Description: This will be an explanation of the various tools that you can use to make video games that are free to use and in most cases open source. The talk will focus on the presenter's favorite tools and how they are used to make video games. This should be a great primer for anyone who is interested in making video games but isn't sure where they should start. Note that this talk will not emphasize teaching how to make video games.  Speakers include:Bobby Bedard - Track: Tech  - Duration: 1 hour
